name: Tomato Spread With Ricotta Cheese
keywords: appetizer, side dish, cheese, sun-dried tomato
recipeIngredient: 1 6-ounce jar sun-dried tomatoes packed in olive oil
4 medium tomatoes, seeded and coarsely chopped
2 cloves garlic, skinned and any green part removed
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the sun-dried tomatoes, fresh tomatoes, garlic and basil in a food processor. Blend to a smooth puree and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Place the ricotta in a mound in the center of a large round plate. Smooth the tomato mixture around the side. Garnish the cheese with a sprig of basil.
